name: Zombie Runner (ANGELB3AR)
description:
This is a First Person Shooter I created to demonstrate my abilities as a programmer.  Zombie Runner is a 5-minute experience that could easily be built out into a more substantial game.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Mouse to aim
  • Click to shoot
  • Number pad or Scroll wheel to switch weapons

Source code available:  https://github.com/ANGELB3AR/Zombie-Runner
